Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Database

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DBConnectivity  
    ETPDataSource
    Class to initiate the database schema via JDBC for SQLite
    MarketplaceDataSource
    Class to handle the Marketplace table in the database, such as insertions, deletions, and retrieval of offers
    MarketplaceHistoryDataSource
    Class to interact with the Marketplace_history table in the database These consists of querying and inserts
    UnitDataSource
    Helper Class for any DataSource class that requires to fetch the organisational unit name and/or ID.
    UsersDataSource
    Class for retrieving data from the database
